sentences.sentence: Your contributions will affect your pension entitlements.
sentences.translation: 你缴纳的养老金分摊额将会影响你领取养老金的数额。

sentences.sentence: It is certainly worth checking up on your benefit entitlements.
sentences.translation: 调查一下你的福利权益无疑是值得的。

sentences.sentence: I said cut spending and cut entitlements.
sentences.translation: 我说要削减开支和资助。
